creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: red knit with yellow metallic thread satin embroidery covers a stiff core; metallic wrapped cords and knots alternate with red cords to form long tassel; narrow, notched strap sewn to reverse; one end includes small metal buckle--sewn on; mounted with leather fitting
dimension:
35 x 2 in. (88.9 x 5.08 cm)
38 1/2 in. (97.79 cm) (object part, tassel)
title: Belt
